Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'nutrition' targeting readability level Graduate. Limit the output to 100 words. Nutrition, the process of providing the body with the food it needs to function properly, is a vital aspect of maintaining overall health. A balanced diet, consisting of the right mix of macronutrients (carbohydrates, proteins, and fats) and micronutrients (vitamins and minerals), ensures that the body receives adequate energy and essential nutrients for growth, repair, and maintenance. Understanding and maintaining a balanced diet is key to preventing nutrient deficiencies and promoting overall health and well-being.
